about.body: Motivated and detail-oriented Frontend Developer with a strong foundation in React.js, Tailwind CSS, and modern web technologies. Passionate about building responsive, user-friendly interfaces and writing clean, maintainable code. Currently expanding expertise in TypeScript and Next.js to deliver scalable, production-ready applications. Seeking a junior frontend position to grow within a collaborative team.
